steps.title: Consultation & Concept
steps.description: We begin by understanding your lifestyle, preferences, and vision. Every design starts with a conversation — your ideas lead the way.

steps.title: Space Planning & Layout
steps.shortDescription: Ensuring every corner serves a purpose
steps.description: We analyze your space and create functional layouts that balance beauty, comfort, and flow — ensuring every corner serves a purpose.

steps.title: Design Development
steps.description: From mood boards to material palettes, we craft a cohesive concept that reflects your personality and enhances your everyday living.

steps.title: Material Selection
steps.description: We handpick high-quality finishes, fixtures, and furnishings — combining textures, tones, and details for timeless elegance.

steps.title: Execution & Supervision
steps.description: Our team ensures seamless coordination and precise workmanship throughout the renovation and installation process.

steps.title: Final Styling & Handover
steps.description: We add the finishing touches that bring your space to life — refined, balanced, and ready to live beautifully.

faq.question: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A single-room design may take 6-8 weeks, while full home renovations typically span 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during the consultation phase.

faq.question: What is your design fee structure?
faq.answer: We offer transparent pricing tailored to each project's scope. Our fees typically include an initial consultation, design development, and project management. Detailed proposals are provided after the discovery consultation.

faq.question: Do you work with existing furniture?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We're skilled at blending cherished existing pieces with new elements to create cohesive, personalized spaces that honor your history while embracing fresh design.

faq.question: Can you work within my budget?
faq.answer: Yes. We pride ourselves on creating beautiful designs across various budget ranges. During our initial consultation, we discuss your budget openly and develop solutions that maximize value without compromising quality.
